title: Breaking 120: Pro Cycling Is Poised to Go Even Faster in a Hyper-Fueling Twist of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’
content:
Experts believe the 'carb ceiling' is there to be shattered - the performance impact could be bonkers: '120g/hr is a reference, but the exact number is far higher.'

Read the full article at Breaking 120: Pro Cycling Is Poised to Go Even Faster in a Hyper-Fueling Twist of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
